item.title: FBI arrests in Michigan stopped potential Halloween terrorist attack, Kash Patel says
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel, in a social media post, said details of the arrests in Michigan would be released later.

item.title: Airlines call on Congress to immediately end government shutdown, pay air traffic controllers
item.description: The airline industry is pushing Republicans and Democrats to reopen the government as air traffic controllers work without pay.
